title: Bricklaying : it's easier than you think
brief_description: This video is designed to teach the inexperienced handy person to completely undertake the building of simple brick structures. It emphasises the importance of using the correct tools and materials and demonstrates the methods and techniques employed by bricklayers to achieve good results for basic brick constructions.
